meanings.sent1: The misshaped cake looked lopsided on the plate.
meanings.sent2: The misshaped rock didn't fit in the collection.
meanings.sent3: The misshaped balloon made funny noises when squeezed.
meanings.sent4: Her misshaped shadow danced on the wall in the evening light.
meanings.sent5: The misshaped puzzle piece was the last one to be found.

meanings.sent1: The misshaped tree had a crooked trunk.
meanings.sent2: The misshaped toy scared the child.
meanings.sent3: The misshaped cloud resembled a fluffy monster.
meanings.sent4: His misshaped reflection in the water looked like a funhouse mirror.
meanings.sent5: The misshaped shadow cast by the streetlight seemed eerie in the fog.
